actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a Veterans' Administration Hospital in Brevard County, Fla.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to construct a Veterans' Administration hospital in Brevard County, Florida. Provides that such hospital shall be a five hundred-bed general medical, surgical, and psychiatric hospital. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as are necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a Veterans' Administration Hospital in Brevard County, Fla.
